Description: Marginal cost for transmission lines in Cost-Benefit Analysis networks. Used to represent congestion costs and market inefficiencies. Defaults to 0.01.
List of planning horizons for which to run CBA
CBA methodologies to apply. Options include 'toot' (Take One Out at a Time) and 'pint' (Put In at a Time). Defaults to ['toot'].
List of TYNDP project identifiers to evaluate in the CBA workflow. Format follows TYNDP project naming conventions (e.g., 't1-t35').

Configuration options specific to CBA network optimization using rolling horizon approach. Uses the same structure as the top-level ``solving`` section (see :ref:`solving_cf`) with CBA-specific defaults for ``options: horizon`` (168 hours) and ``solver: name`` (highs).
